author: Aaron Jones
description:
Adrian Tchaikovsky is one of the best writers out there today. He has an incredible output of stories with a range I haven’t seen for some time. I started reading his work almost 17 years ago, picking up the incredible epic fantasy series Shadows of the Apt starting with Empire in Black and Gold, then […]

The post REVIEW: Made Things by Adrian Tchaikovsky appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Made Things by Adrian Tchaikovsky
